nodes.text: Bibbacca had the head of a Twi'lek and the body of a Wookiee. In the morning he would typically sneak around with a poisoned dagger before fiercely eating his lunch and advising his criminal friends. He would spend his afternoons loudly roaring until it was time to go to bed.
Bibbacca is introduced in the 70th issue of the LucasArts Insider newsletter as part of an advertisement for the Wii version of LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy and is obviously not canonical.
